content.rendered:
INDOOR PLANTS

Our thoughtfully curated range of orchids and flora are the perfect gift for our green lovers.

All our house plants are carefully selected personally by us, then potted into a white ceramic planter, finished with moss and trailing ribbon.

Petite Orchid

$65.00 incl GST

Introducing our newest additional, our petite orchid plant, a touch of nature’s beauty in a petite size. Perfect for thoughtful gifting, whether expressing gratitude to our beloved teachers or honouring a valued corporate connection, it conveys appreciation through its graceful presence. Each mini orchid plant is carefully selected personally by us, then potted into a...

Potted Orchid

$115.00 incl GST

For our Orchid lovers, our deluxe potted Orchid plants are a symbol of luxury and refined taste. An elegant and enduring gift that leaves a timeless reminder of your love and care. Each Orchid plant is carefully selected personally by us, then potted into a white ceramic planter, finished with moss and trailing ribbon, and...

Phalaenopsis Orchid Plant

$175.00 – $295.00 incl GST

A favourite for a reason, our phalaenopsis orchid plants are the ideal gift for those with classic tastes.  Renowned for their resilience and longevity, phalaenopsis orchids thrive in indoor environments, making them perfect additions to home decor or office settings. Positioned in spaces such as reception areas, conference rooms, or executive offices instantly enhances the...

Garden Rose

$75.00 incl GST

For our rose enthusiasts, our garden rose plants bring a timeless essence of natural elegance to any outdoor plant collection. With their delicate petals and lush green leaves, our miniature garden rose plants are a symbol of romance and beauty. These delicate flora enhance any outdoor setting, whether nestled on a patio or flourishing in...

Potted Hydrangea

$85.00 incl GST

For our garden lovers, our exclusive potted Hydrangea plants are the perfect addition to your outdoor plant family. With their fluffy, cloud-like flowers and evergreen foliage, potted Hydrangea plants offer the perfect blend of fresh floral beauty and a gift that continues to give. You can add them to your patio or replant them in...

Welcome to LULLY & ROSE, your premier same-day plant delivery service on the Gold Coast. Our collection features an array of nice indoor potted plants, carefully curated to provide the best options for enhancing your home or office ambiance. Each plant is meticulously selected to infuse elegance and tranquility into your surroundings, ensuring a happy atmosphere wherever they are placed.

From elegant orchids to lush non-flowering indoor foliage, and stunning flowering patio and garden varieties, our flora selection offers something for every preference. Beyond their aesthetic appeal, indoor house plants offer numerous benefits for emotional well-being and overall health. By incorporating them into your living or office space, you can instantly elevate the atmosphere, creating a calming and relaxing environment ideal for unwinding in areas such as bedrooms, living rooms, or even office spaces. Additionally, potted plants contribute to cleaner and healthier indoor air quality by purifying the air.

With our convenient plant delivery service available throughout the Gold Coast, bringing the beauty of nature indoors has never been easier. Take advantage of our same-day delivery option , and experience the joy of enhancing your living or office space with warmth and serenity.

At LULLY & ROSE, we deeply value the unique charm and natural beauty of every potted plant in our collection. Explore our diverse indoor plant selection today and discover the perfect addition to your home or office decor.

Check our indoor plant selection, featuring mini orchids, potted orchids, Phalaenopsis orchids, potted hydrangeas, and garden roses. These plants are available for delivery on the Gold Coast.
